title: "DUI suspect claims Tesla self-drive malfunction after Marin County crash"
excerpt: "A San Rafael man was arrested on allegations of intoxicated driving after crashing a Tesla into three parked vehicles, police said. The driver told police the Tesla was in “full self-drive” mode, but a witness said it was swerving erratically and moving at inconsistent speeds before the crashes,"
